name: Operation Livelock Demo
description:
In the world of Operation Livelock, the terms “good” and “bad” are subjective...
Or they don’t exist.

This is Operation Livelock, a music-synced maze crawler designed and created by Final Wave. Shoot to the beat and avoid a beatdown, while attempting to unravel the secrets of the mysterious Operation Livelock you are now a part of.

A link to Final Wave's Discord: https://discord.gg/uFm3j2

A link to the official soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/livelocked
